resources.string: Press the \'Continue\' button below to start the game. Everything in the app is part of the research. We kindly ask you to share you opinions with us through the questionnaire. You will first be shown a unique participation code, please fill in this code in the questionnaire. After you have played a game of 2048, you will be shown the password to continue. Thank you very much for your participation.
"Fill in this code to proceed with the questionnaire: "
This application is part of a research of students from the University of Twente. The goal of this research is to determine how users experience Android Apps.
For more information you can contact the reseachers at {d.t.r.ikink, j.a.l.starink, v.a.dunning}@student.utwente.nl.
To continue the questionnaire, use the following password: "research"
If you forget your unique participant code, please press the \"ID\" button in the game.
